message: The CLASS_SYSTEM field for indicator 15-4-1, translated into en
data:
Protected Areas are defined as described above by the International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN; Dudley 2008) and documented in the World Database on Protected Areas (www.protectedplanet.net).

Other Effective Area-based Conservation Measures are defined as described above by the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD 2018) and documented in the World Database on Other Effective Area-based Conservation Measures (www.protectedplanet.net/en/thematic-areas/oecms).

Key Biodiversity Areas are defined as described above by IUCN (2016) and documented in the World Database of Key Biodiversity Areas (www.keybiodiversityareas.org/kba-data).
